item.title: Security and Privacy Challenges when immigrating to the US
item.description: International immigration means that people leave their “known” environment and have to interact with new entities, often sharing a lot of sensitive information in a short amount of time. Usually, “adulting" and community help understand how to navigate these. However, when changing the environment radically, these “usual” pathways to navigate data sharing and whether or not something is a “scam” may be a lot harder. We are interested in understanding the challenges that international immigrants to the US face and what measures they undertake to protect their security and privacy.
